dt: {bc}to select by lot and kill every tenth man of
{bc}to exact a tax of 10 percent from

dt.t: Kamieniecki's return comes at a crucial time for a pitching staff that has been {wi}decimated{/wi} by injuries.

dt: {bc}to cause great destruction or harm to

shortdef: to select by lot and kill every tenth man of
to exact a tax of 10 percent from
to reduce drastically especially in number
